entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
